sentences.english: It's much cheaper to anticipate rather than respond.
sentences.chinese: 因爲預先做出反應遠比事後補救便宜的多。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子篩預先經鹼處理，能夠明顯改善催化劑穩定性。

sentences.english: Used to set the track pre-gap for all tracks in sectors globally.
sentences.chinese: 用來設置爲所有全域磁區內軌道的軌道預先間隙。

sentences.english: Eating utensils and food trays are cleaned at the hygiene station with premoistened towelettes.
sentences.chinese: 就餐器具和食物盤在衛生站用預先弄溼的小毛巾清理。

sentences.english: This would be a valid passing opportunity regardless of whether there was pre-existing overlap.
sentences.chinese: 這時後車有權超越，無論有無預先存在“重疊”。

sentences.english: Thus, network issues are supposed to be detected and pro-actively addressed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，網絡故障將會被探測並預先解決。

sentences.english: Randomisation assignments were generated by the medical coordinating centre by a pre-decided schedule.
sentences.chinese: 醫療協調中心根據預先制訂的計劃生成隨機化分配。

sentences.english: Such advance studies can greatly expedite regulatory approval.
sentences.chinese: 這種預先研究可以大大加快管制審批。

sentences.english: You can also pick from a list of pre-defined ABG types.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以從一個預先定義的ABG類型當中進行挑選。

sentences.english: Investment is all upfront. There is no insurance available.
sentences.chinese: 投資都是預先支付，買不到任何保險服務。

sentences.english: Anyone who would like to request teachings from Rinpoche, kindly register early for a private interview.
sentences.chinese: 如需向仁波切請法，請預先報名以便通知。

sentences.english: You can include additional files in your pre-deployment or post-deployment script.
sentences.chinese: 可在預先部署腳本或後期部署腳本中包含其他文件。

sentences.english: The computer then calls back at a certain preauthorized number.
sentences.chinese: 計算機隨後會回叫某個預先授權的號碼。

sentences.english: The surprises will be announced once we are prepositioned to accomplish them.
sentences.chinese: 的驚喜將公佈一次，我們預先實現這些目標。

sentences.english: Or, at least a series of foods that have previously been programmed into the machine.
sentences.chinese: 或者，至少是那些被預先編到機器程序裏的食物。

sentences.english: Predetermine the rest positions on a route and only chalk up and rest there.
sentences.chinese: 預先設定好一條路線的休息點並且只在那一點上休息。
